trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Pinta uma área com um gradiente linear.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints an area with a linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> pinta uma área com um gradiente linear.

trans-unit.source: A linear gradient defines a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Um gradiente linear define um gradiente ao longo da linha.

trans-unit.source: The line's end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Pontos de extremidade da linha são definidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> propriedades de gradiente linear.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> brush paints its <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A> along this line.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> pincel pinturas seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops%2A> ao longo desta linha.

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Gradiente linear padrão é diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being painted, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being painted.
trans-unit.target: No padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> de um gradiente linear é (0,0), o canto superior esquerdo da área que está sendo pintada e sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> será (1,1), o canto inferior direito da área que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: As cores de gradiente resultante são interpoladas ao longo do caminho diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra uma gradação diagonal.

trans-unit.source: A line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha foi adicionada para realçar o caminho de interpolação de gradiente do ponto de início para o ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient")
trans-unit.target: ![Eixo de gradiente para um gradiente linear diagonal](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "eixo de gradiente para um gradiente linear diagonal")

trans-unit.source: A diagonal linear gradient
trans-unit.target: Um gradiente linear diagonal

trans-unit.source: The next illustration shows the same linear gradient, but with highlighted gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra o mesmo linear gradiente, mas com limites de gradiente realçadas.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient stops in a linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "Gradient stops in a linear gradient")
trans-unit.target: ![Marcas de gradiente em um gradiente linear](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-4gradientstops.png "marcas de gradiente em um gradiente linear")

trans-unit.source: A diagonal linear gradient with highlighted gradient stops
trans-unit.target: Um gradiente linear diagonal com limites de gradiente realçadas

trans-unit.source: It is possible to specify a gradient axis that does not completely fill area being painted.
trans-unit.target: É possível especificar um eixo de gradiente que não preenche completamente área que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A> property determines how the remaining area is painted.
trans-unit.target: Quando isso ocorrer, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod%2A> propriedade determina como a área restante é pintada.

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
trans-unit.target: Recursos congeláveis

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> é um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> de objeto e, portanto, pode ser congelada para melhorar o desempenho.

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> recursos, como congelamento e clonagem, consulte [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> do pincel é inicializado como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> do pincel é inicializado como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> a definir neste pincel.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> que tem as marcas de gradiente especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> do pincel é inicializado como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> a definir neste pincel.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the angle, in degrees, of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o ângulo, em graus, do gradiente.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 0,0 cria um gradiente horizontal e um valor 90,0 cria um gradiente vertical.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> and angle.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> que tem o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection" /> e o ângulo especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> do pincel é inicializado como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> at offset 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> no deslocamento 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> at offset 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> no deslocamento 1,0.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> that represents the angle, in degrees, of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Double" /> que representa o ângulo, em graus, do gradiente.

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.0 creates a horizontal gradient, and a value of 90.0 creates a vertical gradient.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de 0,0 cria um gradiente horizontal e um valor 90,0 cria um gradiente vertical.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified start <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, end <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, and angle.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> que tem o início <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, final <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> e ângulo especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> do pincel é inicializado como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> to set on this brush.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops" /> a definir neste pincel.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> do gradiente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> do gradiente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified gradient stops, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> que tem as paradas de gradiente especificadas, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> do pincel é inicializado como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> at offset 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> no deslocamento 0,0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> at offset 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> no deslocamento 1,0.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> do gradiente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> do gradiente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> class that has the specified start <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, end <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> que tem o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> inicial, o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Color" /> final, o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> e o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> especificados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of the brush is initialized to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> do pincel é inicializado como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e referências de recurso (mas eles não podem mais resolver), mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem tiver sido <see langword="true." />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável desse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush" />, fazendo cópias em profundidade dos valores do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências a recursos, vinculações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas seus valores atuais são.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> do objeto clonado será <see langword="false" />, mesmo se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> da origem tiver sido <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objeto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as coordenadas bidimensionais de encerramento do gradiente linear.

trans-unit.source: The ending two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas bidimensionais de encerramento do gradiente linear.

trans-unit.source: The default is (1,1).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é (1,1).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> pinta uma gradação ao longo da linha.

trans-unit.source: The line's start and end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: A linha pontos inicial e final são definidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> propriedades da <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Gradiente linear padrão é diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled.
trans-unit.target: No padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> de um gradiente linear é (0,0), o canto superior esquerdo da área de preenchimento e sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> será (1,1), o canto inferior direito da área de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: As cores de gradiente resultante são interpoladas ao longo do caminho diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: A imagem a seguir mostra uma gradação diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: A linha preta foi adicionada para realçar o caminho de interpolação de gradiente do ponto de início para o ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient")
trans-unit.target: ![Eixo de gradiente para um gradiente linear diagonal](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "eixo de gradiente para um gradiente linear diagonal")

trans-unit.source: A diagonal linear gradient
trans-unit.target: Um gradiente linear diagonal

trans-unit.source: Specifying Relative or Absolute Values
trans-unit.target: Especificando relativos ou absolutos

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determines whether its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determina se seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> é interpretado como um valor relativo ou absoluto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> value is relative to the size of the painted area.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox> Especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> valor é relativo ao tamanho da área de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.Absolute> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> value is expressed in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.Absolute> Especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> valor é expresso em pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>, making the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> a relative value.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>, tornando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> um valor relativo.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting two-dimensional coordinates of the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as coordenadas bidimensionais de início do gradiente linear.

trans-unit.source: The starting two-dimensional coordinates for the linear gradient.
trans-unit.target: As coordenadas bidimensionais iniciais do gradiente linear.

trans-unit.source: The default is (0, 0).
trans-unit.target: O padrão é (0, 0).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> paints a gradient along a line.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> pinta uma gradação ao longo da linha.

trans-unit.source: The line's start and end points are defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: A linha pontos inicial e final são definidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> propriedades da <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The default linear gradient is diagonal.
trans-unit.target: Gradiente linear padrão é diagonal.

trans-unit.source: In the default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> of a linear gradient is (0,0), the upper-left corner of the area being filled, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> is (1,1), the lower-right corner of the area being filled.
trans-unit.target: No padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> de um gradiente linear é (0,0), o canto superior esquerdo da área de preenchimento e sua <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> será (1,1), o canto inferior direito da área de preenchimento.

trans-unit.source: The colors in the resulting gradient are interpolated along the diagonal path.
trans-unit.target: As cores de gradiente resultante são interpoladas ao longo do caminho diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The following image shows a diagonal gradient.
trans-unit.target: A imagem a seguir mostra uma gradação diagonal.

trans-unit.source: The black line was added to highlight the interpolation path of the gradient from the start point to the end point.
trans-unit.target: A linha preta foi adicionada para realçar o caminho de interpolação de gradiente do ponto de início para o ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: ![Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "Gradient axis for a diagonal linear gradient")
trans-unit.target: ![Eixo de gradiente para um gradiente linear diagonal](~/add/media/wcpsdk-graphicsmm-diagonalgradientaxis.png "eixo de gradiente para um gradiente linear diagonal")

trans-unit.source: A diagonal linear gradient
trans-unit.target: Um gradiente linear diagonal

trans-unit.source: Specifying Relative or Absolute Values
trans-unit.target: Especificando relativos ou absolutos

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determines whether its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> is interpreted as a relative or absolute value.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> determina se seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> é interpretado como um valor relativo ou absoluto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> value is relative to the size of the painted area.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox> Especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> valor é relativo ao tamanho da área de pintura.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.Absolute> specifies that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> value is expressed in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.Absolute> Especifica que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> valor é expresso em pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>, making the <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> a relative value.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode.RelativeToBoundingBox>, tornando o <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> um valor relativo.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint" />.
